text:
Roger Bowen (May 25, 1932 – February 16, 1996) was an American actor and novelist. He was known for his role of Lt. Col. Henry Blake in the 1970 movie "MASH". He was born in Providence, Rhode Island.
Bowen died on February 16, 1996 while on vacation in Marathon, Florida from a heart attack, aged 63. The day before, McLean Stevenson who played Henry Blake in the television show, died.
